blocks.block_text: Dressed in black O ' Farid ! Sufi goes all - around , Darkest his deeds , guile and wickedness abound . Sin - engulfed , day and night tormented in pain ,
lines: Dressed in black O ' Farid ! Sufi goes all - around , Darkest his deeds , guile and wickedness abound . Sin - engulfed , day and night tormented in pain ,

blocks.block_text: Though famous as a Faqir , Yet sure Hell - bound .
lines: Though famous as a Faqir , Yet sure Hell - bound .
